description:
Ed and Kaito burst into Yuuri and Yuugo`s Duel! They press hard with D Hero and Light Dragon, but the four person battle only rages harder. Ed, having learned the true joy of a Duel from Yuuya, calls a new monster and attacks with everything he has to save the two of them from the darkness that threatens to swallow them, Z-ARC! In that moment, Yuugo`s heart begins to change...?!
Source: crunchyroll
